Flashlight flickers on incoming calls
Flashlight flickers on incoming SMSes

Flashlight flickers

Flashlight flickers on reaching timer threshold
Application general info
Click and phone\'s barometer sensor shall measure the current height in meters (m). You can set a specific height (m) for which you want to get notified by flashlight flickering.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Application related
Click and you can set exactly after how much time you want to get notified by flashlight flickering.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Click and phone\'s battery power shall be monitored at the level you specify. If reached you will get notified by flashlight flickering.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Click and you will get notified by flashlight flickering when an incoming Call is in progress. Flashlight and Feature will stop if you answer or reject the Call, or after 30 seconds by default.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Click and you will get notified by flashlight flickering on an incoming SMS. Flickering shall stop after 15 seconds by default.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Click and an SOS message in Morse code shall be transmitted continuously from your flashlight.
SOS message is currently transmitted. Click to disable it.
Click and phone\'s audio sensor can identify short sounds. You can switch on and off the flashlight by producing sounds as such, e.g. by finger snapping.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Click and phone\'s rotation sensor can identify its movements. You can switch on and off the flashlight by tilting the phone at 90 degrees angles (from its standpoint).
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.

Click and based on your current phone\'s connection status (i.e. in or out of Network/Data/WiFi), you can get notified by flashlight flickering when a) Network signal, Data or WiFi are found again, b) Network signal, Data or WiFi are lost.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.
Network signal, Data or WiFi are been found!
Network signal, Data or WiFi has been lost.
Click and flashlight shall be flickering at the frequency (in Hz) you specify. By default frequency range is 1 to 10Hz.
Feature is enabled and currently running. Click to disable it.

Close
